summary: ACCORDING TO A USA TODAY ARTICLE GM IS GOING TO BE ISSUING A RECALL FOR 1997-8 SUV'S(W/PWR. MIRRORS), FOR AN ELECTRICAL PROB. IN THE WIRING IN THE DOORTHAT COULD CAUSE A FIRE. I THOUGHT THE RADIO SAID IT WAS 1995-98. MY CAR JUST HAD AN APPARENT SIMMILAR INCIDENT.  MY VEHICLE WAS A 1995 BLAZER LS 2DR.
